## Bio

Hi! I'm Andrea Gilardi and I am an Assistant Professor (Ricercatore SECS-S/01, Legge 240/10 tipo A) at the [Department of Mathematics](https://www.mate.polimi.it/?lg=en) of [Politecnico di Milano](https://www.polimi.it/en). I am a member of the [MOX](https://mox.polimi.it/) laboratory of mathematical modelling and scientific computing. My main research interests focus on spatial and spatio-temporal models for events on linear networks. Love hiking and coding with R.

<p></p>

### Selected Publications

**Gilardi, A.**, Borgoni, R., Mateu, J. (2023+) A non-separable first-order spatio-temporal intensity for events on linear networks: an application to ambulance interventions. Accepted for publication in *Annals of Applied Statistics*. [\[Link\]](https://arxiv.org/abs/2106.00457).

**Gilardi, A.**, Borgoni, R., Presicce, L., Mateu, J. (2023) Measurement Error Models for Spatial Network Lattice Data: Analysis of car crashes in Leeds. *Journal of the Royal Statistical Society: Series A (Statistics in Society)*. [\[Link\]](http://doi.org/10.1093/jrsssa/qnad057).

**Gilardi, A.**, Mateu, J., Borgoni, R., Lovelace, R. (2022) Multivariate hierarchical analysis of car crashes data considering a spatial network lattice. *Journal of the Royal Statistical Society: Series A (Statistics in Society)*. [\[Link\]](http://doi.org/10.1111/rssa.12823).

Borgoni, R., **Gilardi, A.**, Zappa, D. (2020). Assessing the Risk of Car Crashes in Road Networks. *Social Indicators Research*. [\[Link\]](https://doi.org/10.1007/s11205-020-02295-x).
